text_block_list.text: While I was taking a walk in the park, I heard a familiar voice coming from a candy store nearby…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――Even if it is candy! You must BakuBaku, and Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: No, no, eating with sophistication is what "harmony" is all about, ain't it?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, ho! You've come at an excellent time! Let's ask Trainer about this!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Actually, Ms. Inari and I ran into each other at a candy shop, and we were talking about having tea together, but…

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: We both like Japanese sweets a whole lot, so we got excited about how we should eat the daily special tea cakes, y'see…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No matter what kind of Japanese sweets you eat, you must have Bakushin! You should eat your fill, and eat Baku-fast!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Waitaminute! Those tea cakes go suuper well with hot tea. Savoring them slowly is the best way to be chic!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Chic or Bakushin! Of course, Trainer is on Team Bakushin, are you not!?
choice_data_list: Take your time and savor each one.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Th, that's…!? You won't Bakushin with me, you say!?
choice_data_list:
Rather, put all your Bakushin into one of them, or 
something.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I! see!!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah, savor it to the fullest. That's what I'm talking about!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Indeed, indeed! I'll give you a taste of what I like to call Bakushin Chic!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Baku… Chew… shin… Baku … Munch, munch… shin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmhm! I think I can… …taste the Bakushin Chic!
This is how Sakura Bakushin O was able to enjoy one of the sweets at her leisure.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I thought so―!! You should enjoy sweets to your heart's content!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Enjoy to your heart's content…

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Whoo! Eating out of a bowl this massive is pretty swanky!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Big bowl…! Yes, yes, that's right! Bakushin is amazing!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ms. Inari, Trainer! Let us enjoy Bakushin together!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Of course! Let's see just how huge this bowl is!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakubaku, Bakushin! Bakubaku, Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Ba… Bakubaku, Bakushin? …Bakubaku, Bakushin… Bakuba… Uuugh!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uuuf… H, how's this… This, much food…

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: A, aah… guts, grit… This bowl's hugeness is, admirable… Uuugh.
…Sakura Bakushin O seemed very satisfied with the huge Bakushin Bowl.
